"},{"text":"Vertical Rails","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Ladder will provide a vertical track for minecarts. Minecarts that enter a ladder block will travel upwards."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.vertical_rails.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Once a minecart reaches the top of a ladder, it will have some upward and forward velocity to continue along normal rails."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.vertical_rails.2"}]}]
